import React, { useContext } from "react"; import "./PlaceOrder.css"; import { StoreContext } from "../../context/StoreContext"; function PlaceOrder() { const { getTotalCartAmount, token, food_list, cartItems, url } = useContext(StoreContext); const [data, useData] = useState(); return (

); } export default PlaceOrder;
